channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Overflowing bin and fly tipping by bin, 15th September
item.description:
It is a day occurrence that the bin is overfilled and large amounts of rubbish left by bin. Rubbish is then blown into surrounding streets. Can this bin be removed to avoid rubbish being continually dumped in this location?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Erindale, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large bag of clothes/ broken glass, 15th September
item.description:
This bag of clothes has been in Tower Road for 3 weeks being moved from onesie to the other. Also there are broken bottles/glass in the kerb .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tower Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rowan tree fallen, 15th September
item.description:
The rowan tree on Earlsthorpe Road, near the corner of Queensthorpe Road has snapped in half and fallen across the pavement. Please come to remove this tree. Please can a new tree be planted in its place.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Earlsthorpe Road, Perry Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Been park on street for about 2 months checked dvla no MOt reco d, 15th September
item.description:
This car has been parked in our street for abou 2 months now without moving the parking in this street is very crowded and hard to park checked DVLA no Mot recorded

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thornhill Avenue, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On Gravel hill, near the railings that leading to the park, 15th September
item.description:
The signpost base is rotten and rusted to the point the sign has fall onto the pavement. The signpost is laying on the pavement and could cause an trip hazard to the public, also the information post will require to be replaced with an new post. Hopefully this work will not take to long, as some of the metal rail at various locations within the bexley area roads need to be replaced
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gravel Hill, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping in parking area between 78 and 86 Victoria Way, 15th September

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Victoria Way, Charlton, London

item.title: The bin on the lamppost is overflowing with bags of dog poo and general rubbish. It hasn’t been emptied for several days and is disgusting., 15th September
item.description:
Please empty this litter bin on the lamppost immediately. It is revolting and needs very regular emptying. It hasn’t been emptied for days and has overflowed on to the pavement.!!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kelsey Lane, Beckenham, London

item.title: Another day, another fly tip, 15th September
